titles.title: Restoring Access to Public Lands Act
To release certain Federal land in California from wilderness study, and for other purposes.
Restoring Access to Public Lands Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
Restoring Access to Public Lands Act
This bill releases specified acreage of the Yolla Bolly, Timbered Crater, Lava, Pit River Canyon, Tule Mountain, South Warner Contiguous, Bitterbrush, Buffalo Hills, Twin Peaks, Five Springs, Dry Valley Rim, Skedaddle, and Tunnison Mountain wilderness study areas in California from further review for designation as wilderness.
